english_example_sentence: The old people did not live in this small village for a long time.
russian_example_sentence: Пожилые люди не жили в этой маленькой деревне долгое время.
turkish_example_sentence: Yaşlı insanlar bu küçük köyde uzun süre yaşamadılar.
